files.summary: Contains: chronological company history. Includes: 1925 foundation, 1970s technical specialization, 1990s ERP rollout, 2008 Serbia plant, 2023 chatbot launch.
Contains: mission, vision, and core values. Includes: protect customers, trusted specialist vision, craftsmanship, reliability, partnership, responsibility, pragmatic innovation.
Contains: marketing & sales strategy plus mandatory CRM policies. Includes: specialist positioning, step‑by‑step sales process, required CRM fields, account‑manager assignment.
Contains: site locations and functions. Includes: Italian HQ/factory, Serbian plant, sales branches in Munich, Paris, Rotterdam, Barcelona, Vienna, and remote work expectations.
Contains: market segments and customer lifecycle phases. Includes: machinery, automotive, rail, food & beverage, flooring markets; CRM deal phases idea‑exploring‑active‑paused‑archived.
Contains: organisational hierarchy and reporting lines. Includes: family ownership, board, CEO, COO, heads of sales, R&D, finance, HR, IT, department headcounts, manager‑employee relationships.
Contains: department names and role titles. Includes: corporate leadership, sales & customer success, R&D, production (Italy/Serbia), logistics, quality, IT, HR, finance positions.

Contains: example employee profiles with departments, managers, skills, and wills. Includes: senior key account manager, senior chemist, production supervisor, IT manager, HR specialist, technical sales engineer.
Contains: company identity and strategic focus. Includes: legal name, brand, product families, project‑centric workflow, growth aims in Europe, digitalisation goals.
Contains: skills & wills definitions and rating guidelines. Includes: skill vs will distinction, 1‑10 rating scale, update process, staffing and development use cases.
Contains: CRM data schema and usage policies. Includes: mandatory customer records, required fields, account‑manager assignment, brief standards, deal‑phase rules, confidentiality.
Contains: chatbot capabilities, outcome codes, and security rules. Includes: answer types, outcome codes (ok_answer, denied_security, etc.), permission enforcement, allowed update actions.
Contains: wiki purpose and editing guidelines. Includes: content ownership, prohibition of sensitive data, linking rules, best‑practice standards for documentation.
Contains: overview of production sites and organization. Includes: Italian flagship plant, Serbian plant roles, workforce traits, production processes, improvement project logging.
Contains: wiki front‑page navigation. Includes: section links to company, business, operations, people, and systems.
Contains: employee registry schema and access policies. Includes: ID, name, email, salary, location, department, skills & wills, confidentiality and visibility rules.
Contains: project registry layout and workload rules. Includes: project ID, customer link, status phases, manager, team assignments, FTE slice allocations, workload calculation method.
Contains: overview of core business systems and design principles. Includes: CRM, project registry, employee registry, time tracking, wiki, chatbot, stability and modernization focus.
Contains: time‑tracking entry schema and workflow rules. Includes: required fields, status lifecycle (draft‑submitted‑approved‑invoiced‑voided), approval process, billable flag, reporting uses.

company_name: Bellini Industria Vernici S.p.A. (brand: Bellini Coatings)
company_execs: Filip Novak — IT & Digitalisation Manager (reports to CFO functionally and CEO for strategic projects)
